feature_name: Hub preview hardening: remove inline embed and tighten truthful copy
scope_summary: Remove the broken inline Hub app embed from hub.html, keep explicit preview entry buttons, and update Hub/App Beta copy to in-development language with no false live/trial claims.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Copy now clarifies preview status and avoids potentially misleading availability claims.
evidence: hub.html no longer implies installed/live product
hub-beta.html now labels environment as in-development preview

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: No data collection behavior or storage scope changed.
evidence: Only static page copy and links changed
No script or network integration changes

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No medical claims added; existing non-medical language remains.
evidence: Hub page continues to state it is not a diagnosis or treatment product

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Removes a broken visual element that added confusion and preserves clear next-step actions.

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: More explicit and literal status language reduces ambiguity and expectation mismatch.
evidence: Copy explicitly says active development and preview environment

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users avoid a broken embed and get accurate status messaging plus working navigation.
evidence: Removed stale inline asset references in hub.html
Internal link/asset path checks passed for changed pages

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Language is direct and non-hype; avoids false promises.
evidence: No fake trial/app-store claims copy added to hub preview section

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Simpler static content removes an unnecessary embedded app region and keeps keyboard-accessible links.

security_and_reliability.rationale: Eliminates stale hashed asset dependencies from the hub marketing page.
evidence: Removed stale /hub/beta/assets/* inline references from hub.html
Verified hub/beta entry assets exist and referenced hashes resolve

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing or conversion flow changes.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify /hub.html and /hub-beta.html render truthful preview messaging and /hub/beta/ opens via CTA without embed artifacts.
